biotools.summary: A program for analyzing and selecting sets of barcodes for mgi-sequencing. The application allows analyzing the compatibility of barcodes on a single lane of a flow cell in a set in the case of equal and arbitrary fractions.

bioschemas.name: BC-store
bioschemas.summary: A program for analyzing and selecting sets of barcodes for mgi-sequencing. The application allows analyzing the compatibility of barcodes on a single lane of a flow cell in a set in the case of equal and arbitrary fractions.
